data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Naoasaki to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Naoasaki, Japan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,377,450 who are far from you in Naoasaki, Japan from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Naoasaki, Japan to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Naoasaki.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the South Asian, Bengali-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the South Asian, Bengali-speaking people know you.
Spirit, help the 7,971 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,399,929 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 7,971 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Naoasaki, Japan has a population of 1,407,900.

We estimate Naoasaki has 7,971 people who might know Jesus, 22,479 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,377,450 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 176 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 7,971 believers in Naoasaki, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.
